text: We know the most - searched beauty brands of 2017 ( some of which we were surprised by ) as well as the most - searched beauty questions that people looked to Google to answer. Both of these things give us a good indication of the buzziest trends and products from the past 365 days and help us to predict those that are coming up in 2018. But what about drugstore products specifically? Although nothing makes us feel as luxurious as a high - end beauty product or two, there's something especially gratifying about buying multiple beauty products without having to stress about the total amount spent at checkout. That's where CVS comes in ( it happens to be one of our preferred places to pick up drugstore hair and makeup favorites ).
